sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice is hereby given that the Annual Meeting of Stockholders of Helmerich & Payne, Inc. (the "Company"), will be held at Boulder Towers, H&P Conference Center, Eleventh Floor, 1437 South Boulder Avenue, Tulsa, Oklahoma, at 12:00 noon, Tulsa time, on Wednesday, March 1, 2017, for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect as Directors the eight nominees named in the attached proxy statement to serve until the Annual Meeting of Stockholders in 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent auditors for fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To cast an advisory vote to approve the compensation of our executives disclosed in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. To cast an advisory vote on whether a stockholder advisory vote to approve executive compensation should occur ever 1, 2 or 3 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. To consider and transact any other business which properly may come before the meeting or any adjournment thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the By-laws, the close of business on January 6, 2017, has been fixed as the record date for the determination of the stockholders entitled to notice of, and to vote at, the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The stock transfer books will not close.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company is pleased to take advantage of the rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission (the "SEC") that allow issuers to furnish proxy materials to their stockholders on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company believes these rules allow it to provide you with the information you need while lowering the costs of delivery and reducing the environmental impact of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company is mailing to most of its stockholders a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, rather than a paper copy of the proxy statement, proxy and 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice contains instructions on how to access the proxy materials, vote and obtain, if you so desire, a paper copy of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important!
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you expect to be present at the Annual Meeting, please vote as promptly as possible so that we may be assured of a quorum to transact business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by using the Internet or telephone, or by signing, dating and returning the proxy mailed to those who receive paper copies of this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a stockholder of Helmerich & Payne, Inc., you are invited to attend the Annual Meeting of Stockholders on March 1, 2017 (the "Annual Meeting") and vote on the items of business described in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy is being solicited by and on behalf of the Board of Directors of Helmerich & Payne, Inc., and will be voted at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Throughout this proxy statement, Helmerich & Payne, Inc. is referred to as the "Company," "we," "our" or "us."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Important Notice of Electronic Availability of Materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As permitted by the rules of the SEC, we are making our 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders and this proxy statement available to stockholders electronically via the Internet at the following website: www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Most stockholders will not receive printed copies of the proxy materials unless they request them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials ("Notice"), which was mailed to most of our stockholders, explains how you may access and review the proxy materials and how you may submit your proxy on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received the Notice, you will not receive a printed copy of the proxy materials unless you request it by following the instructions for requesting such materials contained in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who requested paper copies of proxy materials or previously elected to receive proxy materials electronically did not receive the Notice and are receiving the proxy materials in the format requested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice and the proxy materials are first being made available to our stockholders on o about January 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Meeting Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Annual Meeting will be held at Boulder Towers, H&P Conference Center, Eleventh Floor, 1437 South Boulder Avenue, Tulsa, Oklahoma, at 12:00 noon, Tulsa time, on Wednesday, March 1, 2017, unless adjourned or postponed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directions to the meeting can be obtained by calling our Investor Relations department at 918-742-5531.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name with the Company's transfer agent, you are considered a "stockholder of record".
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in a brokerage account, by a trustee or by another nominee, you are considered a "beneficial owner" of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders of record or beneficial owners of the Company's common shares may attend the meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record, you may be asked to present proof of identification, such as a driver's license.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial owners must also present evidence of share ownership, such as a recent brokerage account or bank statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All attendees must comply with our standing rules, which will be distributed upon entrance to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the Annual Meeting, we recommend that you also vote by proxy as described in this proxy statement so that your vote will be counted if you later decide not to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Items of Business at Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Items of business scheduled to be voted on at the Annual Meeting are:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 1   The election of Directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2   The ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent auditors for fiscal 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 3   The advisory vote on executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 4   The advisory vote on whether a stockholder advisory vote to approve executive compensation should occur every 1, 2 or 3 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will also consider any other business that properly comes before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Recommendation on Voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors recommends that you vote your shares FOR the eight Director nominees identified under Proposal 1, and FOR Proposals 2 and 3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors makes no recommendation with respect to Proposal 4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record date and quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The holders of a majority of our outstanding stock entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting must be present in person or by proxy for the transaction of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is called a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes (discussed below) will be counted for purposes of determining the presence of a quorum at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the close of business on January 6, 2017, there were 108,614,238 issued and outstanding shares of our common stock, the holders of which are entitled to one vote per share on all matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have no other class of securities entitled to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders of record at the close of business on January 6, 2017, will be entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting voting instructions for shares held in your name (i.e., you are a stockholder of record).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your shares of common stock by telephone or over the Internet, which saves the Company money, or by completing, signing and returning a proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A properly submitted proxy will be voted in accordance with your instructions unless you subsequently revoke your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you submit a signed proxy without indicating your vote, the person voting the proxy will vote your shares according to the Board of Director's recommendation with respect to Proposals 1, 2 and 3 (FOR the eight Director nominees identified in this proxy statement, and FOR Proposals 2 and 3).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not indicate your voting preference as to Proposal 4 when you submit a signed proxy, the shares represented by your proxy will be voted ABSTAIN with respect to Proposal 4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting voting instructions for shares held in street name (i.e., you are the beneficial owner of your shares).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares, follow the instructions you receive from your broker or other organization holding your shares in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you want to vote in person, you must obtain a legal proxy from your broker and bring it to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not submit voting instructions to the organization that holds your shares, that organization may still be permitted to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, under applicable New York Stock Exchange rules, the organization that holds your shares may generally vote on routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2, the approval and appointment of the Company's independent auditor, is a routine matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, absent specific instructions from beneficial owners, brokers may not vote for non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 1, the election of directors, Proposal 3, the advisory vote on executive compensation, and Proposal 4, the advisory vote on whether a stockholder advisory vote to approve executive compensation should occur every 1, 2 or 3 years, are non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, there may be broker non-votes with respect to Proposals 1, 3 and 4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revoking your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder giving a proxy may revoke it at any time by submission of a later dated proxy or subsequent Internet or telephonic proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who attend the Annual Meeting may revoke any proxy previously granted and vote in person by written ballot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting Requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The election of Directors will require the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast by the shares of common stock voting in person or by proxy at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the votes cast means that the number of shares voted FOR a Director must exceed the number of shares voted AGAINST that Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes will not affect the outcome of the election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Director who receives a greater number of votes AGAINST his or her election than votes FOR such election shall tender his or her resignation to the Board of Directors in accordance with our Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will consider the resignation and recommend to the Board of Directors whether to accept or reject the resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors will consider all factors it deems relevant, make a determination and publicly disclose its decision within 120 days following the date of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With regard to Proposals 2 and 3, the affirmative vote of a majority of shares of common stock present in person or by proxy at the Annual Meeting and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting is required for approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A share that is a broker non-vote is not considered a share entitled to vote on the particular matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, even though broker non-votes are counted in determining a quorum, with respect to Proposal 3, broker non-votes are excluded from the denominator in determining whether affirmative votes represented a majority of those present and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposals 2 and 3, abstentions will have the effect of a negative vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finally, with respect to Proposal 4, the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation receiving the greatest number of votes (every 1, 2 or 3 years) will be considered the frequency recommended by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes will therefore have no effect on such vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each outstanding share of our common stock will be entitled to one vote on each matter considered at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With regard to Proposal 1, election of Directors, stockholders may vote FOR or AGAINST a Director nominee or abstain from voting on a Director nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxies executed and returned (or delivered via telephone or over the Internet) can be voted only for the named nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With regard to Proposal 2, ratification of independent auditors, and Proposal 3, the advisory vote on executive compensation, a stockholder may vote FOR or AGAINST the matter or abstain from voting on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finally, with regard to Proposal 4, the advisory vote on the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation, a stockholder may vote to hold any advisory vote on executive compensation every "1 year", "2 years", or "3 years" or abstain from voting on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Tabulation and Results
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. will tabulate all votes which are received prior to the date of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We intend to publish final results in a Current Report on Form 8-K to be filed with the SEC within four business days of the Annual Meeting.

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted Corporate Governance Guidelines to address significant corporate governance issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The guidelines, as well as our Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation and By-Laws, all Board committee charters, our Code of Business Conduct and Ethics, applicable to all our Directors, officers, and employees, the Code of Ethics for Principal Executive Officer and Senior Financial Officers, the Related Person Transaction Policies and Procedures, the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act Compliance Policy, and certain Audit Committee Practices are available on our website, www.hpinc.com, under the "Governance" section.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information on our website is not incorporated by reference in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A printed copy of the above mentioned documents will be provided without charge upon written request to our Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines provide a framework for our corporate governance initiatives and cover topics such as director independence and selection and nomination of director candidates, communication with the Board, Board committee matters, and other areas of import.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain highlights from our Corporate Governance Guidelines, as well as other corporate governance matters, are discussed below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines provide that a majority of the Board must meet the requirements for being an independent director under the listing standards of the NYSE and applicable law, including the requirement that the Board affirmatively determine that the Director has no material relationship with us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To guide its determination of whether a Director is independent, the Board has adopted the following categorical standards:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Director will not be independent if:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director is, or has been, within the last three years, our employee, or an immediate family member is, or has been within the last three years, our executive officer;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director has received, or an immediate family member has received, during any twelve-month period within the last three years, more than $120,000 in direct compensation from us, other than Director and committee fees and pension and other forms of deferred compensation for prior service (provided such compensation is not contingent in any way on continued service);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director is a current partner or employee of a firm that is our internal or external auditor;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director has an immediate family member who is a current partner of a firm that is our internal or external auditor;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director has an immediate family member who is a current employee of a firm that is our internal or external auditor and who personally works on the Company's audit;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director or an immediate family member was within the last three years a partner or employee of a firm that is our internal or external auditor and personally worked on our audit within that time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director or an immediate family member is, or has been within the last three years, employed as an executive officer of another company where any of our present executive officers at the same time serves or served on that company's compensation committee; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director is a current employee, or an immediate family member is a current executive officer, of a company that has made payments to, or received payments from, us for property or services in an amount which, in any of the last three fiscal years, exceeds the greater of $1,000,000 or two percent (2%) of such other company's consolidated gross revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the following commercial and charitable relationships will not be considered material relationships that would impair a director's independence:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director (or an immediate family member of the Director) is, or during the last fiscal year has been, an affiliate or executive officer of another company (including banks or financial institutions) to which we were indebted, or to which such other company was indebted to us, during the last or current fiscal year and the total amount of indebtedness did not exceed two percent (2%) of the total consolidated assets of the indebted entity at the end of such fiscal year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director (or an immediate family member of the Director) is, or during the last fiscal year has been, an executive officer, director or trustee of a charitable organization where our annual discretionary charitable contributions to the charitable organization, in the last or current fiscal year did not exceed the greater of $1,000,000 or two percent (2%) of that organization's consolidated gross revenues;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director (or an immediate family member of a Director) is a member of, employed by, or of counsel to a law firm or investment banking firm that performs services for us, provided the payments made by us to the firm during a fiscal year do not exceed two percent (2%) of the firm's gross revenues for the fiscal year, and the Director's relationship with the firm is such that his or her compensation is not linked directly or indirectly to the amount of payments the firm receives from us; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a relationship arising solely from a Director's position as a director of another company that engages in a transaction with us shall not be deemed a material relationship or transaction that would cause a Director to not be independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Director who is a member of our Audit Committee will not be independent if such Director:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) other than in his or her capacity as a member of the Audit Committee, the Board or any other Board committee, accepts directly or indirectly any consulting, advisory or other compensatory fee from us or any subsidiary (except for retirement benefits to the extent permitted by applicable rules of the SEC); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) is an affiliated person (as defined by the SEC) of us or any subsidiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Similarly, in affirmatively determining the independence of any Director who will serve on the Human Resources Committee, the Board considers all factors specifically relevant to determining whether a Director has a relationship to the Company which is material to that Director's ability to be independent from management in connection with the duties of a Human Resources Committee member, including, but not limited to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the source of compensation of such Director, including any consulting, advisory or other compensatory fee paid by the Company to such Director; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) whether such Director is affiliated with the Company, a subsidiary of the Company or an affiliate of a subsidiary of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, relationships not addressed by the NYSE rules or otherwise described above will not cause an otherwise independent Director to be considered not independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For relationships that do not fall within the categories delineated above, the Directors who are otherwise independent under the guidelines will determine whether a relationship is material and, therefore, whether the Director would be independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company's ownership of our common stock,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) Mr. Rust's former position as Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer of State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) that Mr. Zeglis is a director of State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to Laredo Petroleum, Inc. (of which Mr. Foutch is an officer and director).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payments made to the Company by those entities have not exceeded two percent of the consolidated gross revenues of such entities during any applicable fiscal year.

sentences.text: General Principles and Procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are of the view that the continuing service of qualified incumbents promotes stability and continuity in the boardroom, contributing to the Board's ability to work as a collective body, while giving us the benefit of familiarity and insight into our affairs that our Directors have accumulated during their tenure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the process for identifying nominees shall reflect our practice of re-nominating incumbent Directors who continue to satisfy the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee's ("Committee") criteria for membership on the Board, whom the Committee believes continue to make important contributions to the Board, and who consent to continue their service on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, and as more fully outlined in the Corporate Governance Guidelines, in considering candidates for election at annual meetings of stockholders, the Committee will:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: consider if the Director continues to satisfy the minimum qualifications for director candidates as set forth in the Corporate Governance Guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assess the performance of the Director during the preceding term; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: determine whether there exist any special, countervailing considerations against re-nomination of the Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Committee determines that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) an incumbent Director consenting to re-nomination continues to be qualified and has satisfactorily performed his or her duties as Director during the preceding term, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) there exist no reasons, including considerations relating to the composition and functional needs of the Board as a whole, why in the Committee's view the incumbent should not be re- nominated, then the Committee will, absent special circumstances, propose the incumbent Director for re-election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee will identify and evaluate new candidates for election to the Board where there is no qualified and available incumbent, including for the purpose of filling vacancies or a decision of the Directors to expand the size of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committe will solicit recommendations for nominees from persons that the Committee believes are likely to be familiar with qualified candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may also determine to engage a professional search firm to assist in identifying qualified candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As to each recommended candidate that the Committee believes merits consideration, the Committee will:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: cause to be assembled information concerning the background and qualifications of the candidate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: determine if the candidate satisfies the minimum qualifications required by our Corporate Governance Guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: determine if the candidate possesses any of the specific qualities or skills that the Committee believes must be possessed by one or more members of the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: consider the contribution that the candidate can be expected to make to the overall functioning of the Board; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: consider the extent to which the membership of the candidate on the Board will promote diversity among the Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on all available information and relevant considerations, the Committee will select and recommend to the Board a candidate who, in the view of the Committee, is most suited for membership on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualification Standards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All persons nominated to serve as one of our Directors should possess the following minimum qualifications more fully discussed in our Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, all candidates:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: must be individuals of personal integrity and ethical character;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: should be free of conflicts of interest that would materially impair his or her judgment;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: must be able to represent fairly and equally all of our stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: must have demonstrated achievement in business, professionally, or the like;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: must have sound judgment;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: must have a general appreciation regarding major issues facing public companies of a size and operational scope similar to ours;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: must have, and be prepared to devote, adequate time to the Board and its committees; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: must not conflict with any of our term or age limits for Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee will also ensure that:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: at least a majority of the Directors serving at any time on the Board are independent, as defined under the rules of the NYSE and applicable law;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: at least three of the Directors satisfy the financial literacy requirements required for service on the Audit Committee under the rules of the NYSE; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: at least some of the independent Directors have experience as senior executives of a public or substantial private company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines also provide, in lieu of a formal diversity policy, that as part of the nomination process, the Committee will consider diversity in professional background, experience, expertise, perspective, age, gender, and ethnicity with respect to Board composition as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to diversity, we place particular emphasis on identifying candidates whose experiences and talents complement and augment those of other Board members with respect to matters of importance to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We attempt to balance the composition of the Board to promote comprehensive consideration of issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our current Board composition achieves this through widely varying levels and types of business and industry experience among current Board members.

sentences.text: Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the course of the last two and a half years our industry experienced a severe decline in oil prices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oil prices exceeded $100 per barrel in July of 2014 and dropped to below $30 per barrel in January and February of 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This overall decline in prices caused the industry active rig count in the United States to fall to levels below those experienced during the recession in 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the second half of fiscal 2016 oil prices rebounded modestly from observed lows but generally remained below $50 per barrel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, the United States active rig count began to slowly increase again in 2016 and we similarly experienced an increase in demand and activity beginning in May of 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nevertheless, at the close of fiscal 2016, the United States active rig count remained below the number of active rigs at the bottom of the 2009 down cycle and dayrate pricing and average rig margins remained depressed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of these difficult market conditions, we reported a net loss of $56 million ($0.54 per diluted share) from operating revenues of $1.6 billion for fiscal 2016, our first annual loss in over 50 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nevertheless, during fiscal 2016, our strong balance sheet and strong liquidity position allowed us to pay dividends of approximately $2.76 per share of common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our total stockholder return for fiscal 2016 ranked in the 92nd percentile relative to our peers within our Compensation Peer Group (defined and discussed below).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our three year and five year total stockholder returns each ranked in the 99th percentile.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For fiscal 2015, we did not pay bonuses in the midst of the industry downturn despite reporting net income of $422 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No bonuses were paid because we did not achieve the threshold level of performance with respect to our corporate performance criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, for fiscal 2016, we did pay our CEO and other current named executive officers partial bonuses.
